description.EN: Special mirrors that make customers look slimmer.
description.ES: Special mirrors that make look slimmer the person that is using them.
description.FR: Miroirs spéciaux faisant sembler plus mince la personne qui s'y regarde.
description.DE: Spezialspiegel, der die Person, die hineinsieht, schlanker erscheinen lässt.
description.IT: Speciali specchi che fanno sembrare più magre le persone che li usano.

description.EN: This is a precaution since nobody has ever seen an alien.
description.ES: Just in case: nobody has ever seen an alien.
description.FR: Juste au cas où. Personne n'a jamais vu d'extraterrestre.
description.DE: Nur für den Fall: Niemand hat bis jetzt einen Außerirdischen gesehen.
description.IT: Una misura di sicurezza per i più lungimiranti, giacché nessuno ha mai visto un alieno.

description.EN: Research this to have access to the best design techniques available.
description.ES: Research this to have access to the best design technics available.
description.FR: Cette recherche vous permet daccéder aux meilleures techniques de design qui existent.
description.DE: Entwickeln Sie das, um an die besten Designtechniken zu gelangen.
description.IT: Questa ricerca permette di avere accesso alle più avanzate tecniche di design nel campo dell'alta moda.

description.EN: Laser stitches replace sewing, while the process is quite efficient garments can sometimes look dull.
description.ES: Laser stitches keep fabrics together. Quite efficient, but garments can't look dull sometimes.
description.FR: Les points faits au laser permettent d'assurer la couture des tissus. Très efficace, mais les vêtements ont parfois un aspect étrange.
description.DE: Laserstiche halten die Stoffe zusammen. Aber die Kleidung hört nicht auf zu scheinen.
description.IT: Le cuciture al laser sono molto resistenti, ma a volte danno agli indumenti un aspetto un po' incolore.

description.EN: Some of your stores specialize in clothes for overweight people.
description.ES: Some of your stores are specialized in clothes for overwheight people.
description.FR: Certains de vos magasins sont spécialisés dans les vêtements pour personnes corpulentes.
description.DE: Einige Ihrer Geschäfte sind auf die Bekleidung in XXL-Größen spezialisiert.
description.IT: Alcuni dei tuoi negozi si specializzano in indumenti per le persone sovrappeso.

description.EN: One of your shop assistants poses as a customer and drops casual compliments to customers that are deciding whether to purchase the clothes that they are trying on.
description.ES: One of your shop assistant dresses like a client and drops casual compliments to customers that are deciding if to purchase the clothes that they are trying on.
description.FR: L'un de vos vendeurs se fait passer pour un client et fait des compliments aux clients qui hésitent à acheter les vêtements qu'ils essayent.
description.DE: Einer Ihrer Angestellten zieht sich an wie ein Kunde und komplimentiert Kunden, die sich gerade entscheiden, ob sie das anprobierte Kleidungsstück kaufen sollen oder nicht
description.IT: Uno dei tuoi commessi si finge cliente e fa complimenti ai clienti veri mentre provano i vestiti, incoraggiandoli a comprare questo o quel capo.

name.FR: Base de données des goûts et des mensurations des clients
name.IT: Archivio di misure e gusti dei clienti

description.EN: Store the measurements and clothing tastes of your clients in a database; call them at home when your store receives something they may like.
description.ES: Store the measure and the cloth tastes of your clients in a database and call them at home when you have something they may like.
description.FR: Enregistrez les mensurations et les goûts en matière d'habillement de vos clients dans une base de données. Vous pourrez ainsi les appeler chez eux si un article est susceptible de leur plaire.
description.DE: Speichern Sie die Kleidergröße und den Geschmack Ihrer Kunden in einer Datenbank und rufen Sie sie zuhause an, wenn Sie etwas haben, was ihnen gefallen könnte.
description.IT: Memorizza in un data base le misure dei tuoi clienti e i loro gusti in fatto di abbigliamento, così da poterli contattare a domicilio quando hai qualcosa che potrebbe piacergli.

description.EN: License to manage clothes factories.
description.ES: License to manage clothes factories.
description.FR: Licence de gestion d'usines de vêtements.
description.DE: Lizenz für das Management einer Bekleidungsfabrik.
description.IT: La licenza per la gestione di stabilimenti per il confezionamento di indumenti.

description.EN: Pieces of fabric are glued together; garments get bulky.
description.ES: Pieces of fabrics are glued to each other. Garment gets bulky.
description.FR: Les pièces de tissus sont collées les unes aux autres. Les vêtements deviennent amples.
description.DE: Stoffe werden zusammengeklebt. Kleider sind unförmig.
description.IT: I lembi di tessuto sono incollati l'uno all'altro. Ciò aumenta il volume degli indumenti.

description.EN: Accessories such as belts, ties and gloves are given to client as a gift when they spend a lot of money.
description.ES: Accessories like belts, ties and gloves are given as a gift to clients that spend a lot of money.
description.FR: Accessoires, tels que les ceintures, les cravates et les gants sont donnés en cadeau aux clients qui dépensent de grosses sommes d'argent.
description.DE: Accessoires wie Gürtel, Krawatten und Handschuhe werden den Kunden geschenkt, die große Summen ausgeben.
description.IT: Accessori come cinture, cravatte e guanti vengono dati in omaggio ai clienti che fanno ingenti acquisti.

description.EN: Bring couture pieces from Earth's most famous designers.
description.ES: Bring from Earth the top fashion models of famous stylists.
description.FR: Amenez avec vous, depuis la Terre, des modèles haute couture de stylistes réputés.
description.DE: Bringen Sie die Topmodelle berühmter Modemacher von der Erde.
description.IT: Importi dalla Terra i modelli più esclusivi dei grandi stilisti.

description.EN: On-site dry cleaning service for clothes purchased in your stores.
description.ES: On site dry cleaning service for the dresses purchased in your stores.
description.FR: Service de nettoyage à sec sur site pour les robes achetées dans vos magasins.
description.DE: Trockenreinigungsservice vor Ort für die Kleider die in Ihren Geschäften gekauft wurden.
description.IT: Un servizio di pulizia a secco in loco per gli indumenti acquistati presso i tuoi negozi.

description.EN: Specially trained employees that advise customers about the latest trends and fashions.
description.ES: Special employees that advice the clients on the latest trends and fashionable combinations.
description.FR: Employés spécialisés qui conseillent les clients sur les dernières tendances de la mode et les associations de vêtements de bon goût.
description.DE: Spezielle Angestellte, die die Kunden hinsichtlich der letzten Modetrends und Kombinationen beraten.
description.IT: Impiegati incaricati di dare consigli alla clientela sugli ultimi trend e sugli abbinamenti più alla moda.

name.FR: Tenue respectueuse de la clientèle gay

description.EN: Design and produce clothes specifically for the gay man or woman tastes.
description.ES: Design and produce gay friendly wears.
description.FR: Concevez et produisez des vêtements destinés à la clientèle gay.
description.DE: Entwickeln Sie das Design und entwerfen Sie schwulenfreundliche Anzüge.
description.IT: Disegna e confeziona indumenti per la clientela gay.

description.EN: Superior quality suits for managers and CEO.
description.ES: For managers and CEO.
description.FR: Pour managers et PDG.
description.DE: Für Manager und Generaldirektoren.
description.IT: Per i dirigenti e l'amministratore delegato.

description.EN: A broad knowledge of clothing throughout the ages allows for better designs.
description.ES: A deep knoledge of clothing across the ages allows better designs.
description.FR: Une bonne connaissance des vêtements à travers les âges permet d'obtenir de meilleurs concepts.
description.DE: Eine gute Kenntnis der Geschichte der Bekleidung ermöglicht bessere Designs.
description.IT: Una conoscenza approfondita dei mutamenti dell'abbigliamento nelle varie epoche permette di realizzare modelli migliori.

description.EN: A broad knowledge of the evolution of footwear throughout the ages allows for superior shoe designs.
description.ES: A deep knoledge of footwear evolution across the ages allows better shoe designs.
description.FR: Une bonne connaissance de l'évolution des chaussures à travers les âges permet d'obtenir de meilleurs concepts.
description.DE: Eine gute Kenntnis der Geschichte des Schuhwerks ermöglicht bessere Schuhdesigns.
description.IT: Una conoscenza approfondita dei mutamenti delle calzature nella storia permette di realizzare modelli migliori.

description.EN: Learn how to produce clothing that is the center of attention.
description.ES: Learn how to produce clothing that acts as a pure focus of attention.
description.FR: Apprenez à produire des vêtements qui attirent l'attention.
description.DE: Lernen Sie, wie man Kleidung produziert, die Aufmerksamkeit auf sich lenkt.
description.IT: Impara i segreti della realizzazione di capi in grado di concentrare su di sé l'attenzione.

description.EN: Your shops only carry the more common sizes. You can't satisfy everybody but it's more cost-efficient.
description.ES: Your shops carry only the more common sizes. You can't satisfy everybody but it's more efficient.
description.FR: Vos magasins proposent les tailles les plus répandues. Il est impossible de satisfaire tout le monde, mais ce moyen est plus efficace.
description.DE: In Ihren Geschäften findet man nur die gängigen Größen. Sie können zwar nicht alle Kunden bedienen, aber es ist effizienter.
description.IT: I tuoi negozi dispongono solo di indumenti nelle taglie più comuni. Questa politica aumenta l'efficienza ma non permette di soddisfare tutti i clienti.

description.EN: Luxurious undergarments for wealthy customers.
description.ES: Luxurious underwear for rich clients.
description.FR: Sous-vêtements de luxe pour les clients fortunés.
description.DE: Luxusunterwäsche für reiche Kunden.
description.IT: Biancheria intima di gran lusso per la clientela più danarosa.

name.FR: Fabrication de vêtements à grande échelle

description.EN: Learn the basic skills required to manage large scale clothing manufacturing.
description.ES: Learn the basic skills to manage large scale clothes manufacturing.
description.FR: Apprenez les principes élémentaires de gestion de la fabrication de vêtements à grande échelle.
description.DE: Erlernen Sie das Grundwissen für das Management von großen Bekleidungsindustrien.
description.IT: Apprendi le conoscenze di base per gestire una grande industria di abbigliamento.

name.FR: Caisses de recyclage des vêtements usagés
name.IT: Bidoni per il riciclaggio di abiti smessi

description.EN: Your stores have bins where clients can drop off clothes, they no longer use. You give these items to charity.
description.ES: In your stores there are bins in which the clients can drop old used cloths. You give to charity those still in good shape.
description.FR: Vos magasins sont équipés de caisses dans lesquelles les clients peuvent déposer les vêtements usagés. Vous donnez ensuite les vêtements en bon état à des uvres caritatives.
description.DE: In Ihren Geschäften gibt es Container, in die die Kunden ihre alten Kleider werfen können. Sie geben die Sachen, die noch brauchbar sind an die Wohlfahrt weiter.
description.IT: Nei tuoi negozi vi sono bidoni in cui i clienti possono lasciare i vestiti smessi. Quelli ancora portabili vengono dati in beneficenza.

description.EN: Low quality clothes that are thrown away instead of washed.
description.ES: Low quality clothes that are thrown away instead of being washed.
description.FR: Vêtements de mauvaise qualité qui sont jetés au lieu de les laver.
description.DE: Billigkleidung die man wegschmeißt anstatt sie zu waschen.
description.IT: Indumenti di scarsa qualità che possono essere gettati dopo l'uso anziché lavati.

name.FR: Stockage de vêtements passés de mode

description.EN: Since fashion is cyclic, you store clothes that are not in style anymore, until they are in fashion again.
description.ES: Since fashion is cyclic, you stock up on clothes that are not in any more and wait until they are in fashion again.
description.FR: Etant donné que la mode est cyclique, vous stockez des vêtements qui ne sont plus à la mode et attendez qu'ils le soient de nouveau.
description.DE: Da die Mode einem Zyklus folgt, lagern Sie unmoderne Kleider ein und warten, bis sie wieder in Mode kommen.
description.IT: Sapendo che le mode sono cicliche, fai scorta di vestiti fuori moda in attesa che tornino in auge.

name.FR: Retouche de vêtements en temps réel

description.EN: The little adjustment like pant's hem are performed just after the purchase.
description.ES: The little adjustment like pant's hem are performed just after the purchase.
description.FR: Les retouches, telles que les ourlets de pantalons, sont effectuées juste après l'achat.
description.DE: Die kleinen Änderungen, wie die Länge des Saums, werden gleich nach dem Verkauf erledigt.
description.IT: Piccole modifiche come gli orli dei pantaloni vengono effettuate al momento dell'acquisto.

description.EN: To speed up lazy customers and gain more display space.
description.ES: To speed up lazy clients and gain display space.
description.FR: Permettent de presser un peu les clients fainéants et de gagner de la place pour l'étalage.
description.DE: Machen faulen Kunden Beine und schaffen mehr Ausstellungsfläche.
description.IT: Per incoraggiare i clienti più pigri a sbrigarsi e aumentare lo spazio espositivo.

description.EN: Various firms commission shirts from you with their logo, for advertisement purposes.
description.ES: Various firms commision you shirts with their logo on for advertisement purposes.
description.FR: Diverses entreprises sponsorisent vos chemises en y apposant leur logo publicitaire.
description.DE: Verschiedene Firmen geben Hemden mit ihrem Logo zu Werbezwecken in Auftrag.
description.IT: Alcune ditte ti commissionano magliette con il loro logo per scopi promozionali.

description.EN: Produce a line of active wear and sports clothes.
description.ES: Line of sports clothes.
description.FR: Ligne de vêtements pour le sport.
description.DE: Sportbekleidungs-Kollektion.
description.IT: Una linea di indumenti sportivi.

name.IT: Fondamenti del design di alta moda

description.EN: Research the basics of how to make fine clothing and footwear.
description.ES: Research the basics of how to make fine clothing and footwears.
description.FR: Faites des recherches sur les principes de création de vêtements et de chaussures raffinés.
description.DE: Entwickeln Sie die Grundlagen für die Herstellung von schöner Kleidung und Schuhen.
description.IT: Apprendi le conoscenze alla base del design di alta moda nei rami di abbigliamento e calzature.

description.EN: Bring old Earth traditions to the new worlds by reproducing ethnic outfits.
description.ES: Bring the old Earth traditions to the new worlds. Ethnic outfits reproduced.
description.FR: Importez les anciennes traditions de la Terre dans les nouveaux mondes. Reproduction de vêtements ethniques.
description.DE: Bringen Sie die alten Traditionen der Erde in die neuen Welten. Reproduktion von Ethno-Outfits.
description.IT: Trapianti sui nuovi mondi le tradizioni terrestri, riproducendo costumi etnici.

description.EN: Like unisex clothes, but for your feet. The right shoe is identical to the left shoe. The shoe shape is designed to accommodate both the right and left foot.
description.ES: Like unisex, but for your feet. The right shoe is identical to the left shoe. The shoe shape is designed to accomodate both feet.
description.FR: Comme les vêtements unisexes, mais pour les pieds. La chaussure droite est identique à la gauche. La forme de la chaussure est conçue pour s'adapter aux deux pieds.
description.DE: So wie Unisex, aber für die Füße. Der rechte Schuh gleicht genau dem linken. Die Form ist so konzipiert, dass sie auf beide Füße passt.
description.IT: Calzature in cui la scarpa destra è identica alla sinistra, eppure entrambe si calzano alla perfezione.

name.FR: Remise en forme des vêtements usagés

description.EN: Instead of giving used clothes to charities, your in-house tailors repair them and you put them out for sale again.
description.ES: Instead of giving to charity the used clothes you collected, your taylors repair them and you put them for sale again.
description.FR: Au lieu de donner vos vêtements usagés que vous avez collectés à des uvres de bienfaisance, vos couturières les réparent afin de pouvoir les remettre en vente.
description.DE: Anstatt die Altkleider einer Wohlfahrt zu geben, lassen Sie sie von Ihren Schneidern ausbessern und verkaufen sie wieder.
description.IT: Invece di dare in beneficenza gli abiti usati che hai raccolto, incarichi i tuoi sarti di sistemarli in modo che possano essere rivenduti.
